subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets would send Carlos Beltran to San Francisco for a top prospect, most likely Zack Wheeler, a right-handed pitcher taken in the first round of the 2009 draft.
snippet: The Mets would send Carlos Beltran to San Francisco for a top prospect, most likely Zack Wheeler, a right-handed pitcher taken in the first round of the 2009 draft.
